name: Tree Tycoon (Notsleep Room)
description:
A lumberjack simulator in which the player has to chop down a tree, improve his tools.

Pumping your tools, improving the wood that the character cuts, exchanging wood for a game volute, all this is waiting for you here in the RPG Simulator "Logger Simulator"

Features

- A system for buying new tools in the store

- Leveling your tree

- Convenient operation

- Nice graphics

You only need a mouse to play

- The character always looks towards the mouse cursor

- To move, just press the right mouse button
